topic.topicTitle: Adding a Course to your Teaching Group
topic.topicDialog:
If you'd like to assign a new Kerboodle Course* to your Teaching Group, you can update this information on the course page.

*For information about assigning Kerboodle Books, please see the Editing Teaching Groups section.

step.stepTextTip: Once logged into Kerboodle, access your course by clicking on the course name on your homepage or via the Manage Courses page.
Click on the drop down arrow in the Teaching Groups panel.
Click on the Add a Teaching Group to this course option.
Select your Teaching Group and click Add.
The Teaching Group will then appear in the Teaching Groups panel.
